Title: Fools for Love
Plot: House takes the case of a young woman who has been rushed to the hospital with problems breathing and severe stomach pain after she and her husband were robbed. After her husband collapses, the team believes the couple's illnesses are related. Meanwhile, Michael Tritter, a clinic patient, causes problems for House that could have serious ramifications.
GuestStars: Sam Ayers, Carissa Koutantzis, Rod Damer, Scott Allen Rinker, Brett Wagner, Kimberly Quinn, Ricky Ullman, Jurnee Smollett
